articles.description: LAS VEGAS (AP) — Ex-FBI informant accused of lying about President Joe Biden and his son Hunter has been re-arrested, defense lawyer says.
articles.title: Ex-FBI informant accused of lying about President Joe Biden and his son Hunter has been re-arrested, defense lawyer says

articles.author: JOSEF FEDERMAN, SAMY MAGDY and WAFAA SHURAFA
articles.description: JERUSALEM (AP) — International efforts to broker a cease-fire between Israel and Hamas appeared to gain new momentum Thursday as the White House said a visit by a senior envoy with Israeli leaders was “going well” and other mediators reported encouraging signs from the warring parties.
articles.title: Mideast cease-fire efforts gain steam as US envoy visits. Mediators report 'encouraging' signs

articles.author: MARCIA DUNN
articles.description: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) — A private lunar lander circled the moon while aiming for a touchdown Thursday that would put the U.S. back on the surface for the first time since NASA’s famed Apollo moonwalkers.
articles.title: Private lunar lander is closing in on the first US touchdown on the moon in a half-century

articles.author: KIM CHANDLER
articles.description: MONTGOMERY, Ala. (AP) — Additional in vitro fertilization providers in Alabama paused parts of their treatment Thursday, sending patients scrambling to make other plans after the state Supreme Court ruled that frozen embryos are legally considered children.
articles.title: More Alabama IVF providers pause treatment after court ruling on frozen embryos

articles.author: KEN RITTER and RIO YAMAT
articles.description: LAS VEGAS (AP) — A former FBI informant accused of lying about multimillion-dollar bribery allegations against President Joe Biden and his son Hunter and purportedly having links to Russian intelligence was again taken into custody Thursday, two days after a judge said he could be freed ahead of trial, his attorneys said in court documents.
articles.title: Ex-FBI source accused of lying about Bidens and having Russian contacts is returned to US custody

articles.description: RICHMOND, Va. (AP) — Four foreign nationals were charged Thursday with transporting suspected Iranian-made weapons on a vessel intercepted by U.S. naval forces in the Arabian Sea last month. Two Navy SEALs died during the mission.
articles.title: 4 charged in transporting suspected Iranian-made weapons by ship. Navy SEALS died while intercepting

articles.author: MICHELLE CHAPMAN
articles.description: AT&T said Thursday its wireless network was back after an outage knocked out cellphone service for its users across the U.S.
articles.title: AT&T says its cellphone network restored after a widespread outage hit users across the US

articles.author: JIM MUSTIAN and JOSHUA GOODMAN
articles.description: BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) — The way prosecutors tell it, Joseph Bongiovanni went to work for years with a “little dark secret.”Behind the veneer of a veteran U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration agent, they alleged, was a turncoat on the take from the Buffalo Mafia, offering an “umbrella of protection” that derailed investigations of his childhood friends, covered for a sex-trafficking strip club and even helped a connected high school English teacher keep his marijuana-growing side hustle.
articles.title: 'Little dark secret': DEA agent on trial accused of taking $250K in bribes from Mafia

articles.author: JUAN A. LOZANO
articles.description: ANAHUAC, Texas (AP) — A Black high school student’s monthslong punishment by his Texas school district for refusing to change his hairstyle does not violate a new state law that prohibits race-based hair discrimination, a judge ruled on Thursday.
articles.title: Texas school legally punished Black student over hairstyle, judge says

articles.author: KATHY McCORMACK
articles.description: MANCHESTER, N.H. (AP) — A New Hampshire man was convicted of second-degree murder Thursday in the death of his 5-year-old daughter, who police believe was killed nearly two years before she was reported missing in 2021 and whose body was never found.
articles.title: New Hampshire man convicted of killing daughter, 5, whose body has not been found
